function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited dining options at the local university due to construction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in service contexts at micro-, meso-, and macro-levels.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical and social aspects of servicescapes may contribute to the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service encounters as a focal element in service provision","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Servicescapes as the environments for service encounters","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study of the contexts in which service provision takes place","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on food trucks as a research context","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on data from food truck practices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on resilience during environmental uncertainty","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic response leading to increased disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication and transparency about pandemic-related changes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on food trucks and mobile vendors in the context of pandemic response","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased popularity of food trucks leading to higher consumer exposure to different cuisines","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant decline in sales and workforce layoffs in the restaurant and food services industry due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ability and willingness of consumers to continue social dining experiences","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspected ’greenwashing’ in ecotourism","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in product and service production","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unbalanced relationship between human and nature","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respect for local traditions and landscape","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourist activity in local communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management leading to environmental contamination and health hazards","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recruitment of international staff may increase the risk of introducing contagious diseases from abroad.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating students and graduates as trainees and staff may introduce contagious diseases to the lodge.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to retain and train qualified staff for managerial positions may lead to higher turnover and increase the risk of disease transmission due to frequent staff changes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High level of staff and management rotation may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases among different groups of employees.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of contagious diseases spreading within the local indigenous communities due to increased contact with external populations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social activities such as mingas can lead to postponement of work and affect the rhythm of community life","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to amacayacu national park and rich biodiversity may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain long-term toll of coronavirus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interactions between children aged 5 to 18 and the local population can lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in hr organization in the ’new normal’ can lead to challenges in implementing health and safety protocols for employees and visitors.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation practices in hospitality training could lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and close contact during role-playing activities could facilitate the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exchange of ideas and practices between locals and foreign visitors could introduce new pathogens to the community.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging waste collection through incentives may lead to increased human contact with waste, increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Former hunters, now working as wildlife keepers, may still pose a risk of disease transmission due to their previous hunting activities and close contact with wildlife.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of non-organic waste to indigenous communities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ecotourism bringing people from different parts of the world to indigenous communities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of waste management in the community","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and connection to nature leading to unsustainable lifestyle.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of curfew and fines for non-compliance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Marketers not monitoring consumer attitudes, emotions, and usage trends in real time","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empathy and understanding from leaders towards employees’ work-life balance concerns","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health challenges due to pandemic-related emotional impact","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor removal of sars-cov-2 in conventional activated-sludge wwtp","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete reduction of viral load in wastewater treatment systems","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of gene fragments in effluents","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unlikely infectivity and replication-competence of released viral particles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large emission of sars-cov-2 gene equivalents into receiving water bodies from wastewater treatment plants wwtps .","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in viral shedding from infected persons and uncertainty in viral gene copies detected in human excreta.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
